downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Configuring Kerberos Authentication with Role Centers
downloadDescription: This document describes how to configure Kerberos authentication with Enterprise Portal and Role Centers.

downloadFile.name: Configuring Kerberos Authentication with Role Centers.pdf
Configuring Kerberos Authentication with Role Centers.xps

detailsSection: Kerberos authentication is required to display reports created using Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services and Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services on Role Center pages.
detailsSection_file_name: Configuring Kerberos Authentication with Role Centers.pdf
Configuring Kerberos Authentication with Role Centers.xps
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
